issue.title: [JS][Integration] Enable custom_metadata integration test
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8034](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8034). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6556 adds an integration test including custom metadata but JavaScript is skipped.
